DataElement.preferredDefinition: Definition not available._The measurement of radiation by photography, as in x-ray film and film badge, by Geiger-Mueller tube, and by scintillation counting._A diagram that shows step-by-step progression through a procedure or system especially using connecting lines and a set of conventional symbols._The quality of being obtainable or accessible and ready for use or service._The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.
